title: Ice Ages & Climate Change-Best of Coast to Coast AM 5/9/19
itunes:title: Ice Ages & Climate Change-Best of Coast to Coast AM 5/9/19
description:
George Noory and Emeritus Professor Brian Fagan discuss what happens when a little Ice Age starts.  Professor Fagan explains how fishing is affected by climate change and gives his prediction for how the climate change will affect the world in 100 years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
